Class Numbrix

java.lang.Object
  Numbrix

public class Numbrix
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Numbrix puzzle.

Constructor Summary
Numbrix(java.lang.String fileName)
          Constructs a Numbrix puzzle object.
 
Method Summary
 void solve()
          Finds all solutions to the Numbrix puzzle stored in grid by calling recursiveSolve for every possible cell in grid that originally contains a 0 or a 1.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a String which represents the puzzle.

Numbrix

public Numbrix(java.lang.String fileName)
        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Constructs a Numbrix puzzle object.

Parameters:
fileName - the name of the file containing the puzzle data.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - when fileName file does not exist.
Method Detail

solve

public void solve()
Finds all solutions to the Numbrix puzzle stored in grid by calling recursiveSolve for every possible cell in grid that originally contains a 0 or a 1. Each of these calls should attempt to solve the puzzle beginning with the number 1.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a String which represents the puzzle.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
the puzzle numbers with a tab after each number in a row and a new line character after each row. '-' characters should replace 0s in the output.
